name: test_e2e_with_logs[094_XSS_DOM_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_005` |
| **Name** | outerHTML DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `outerHTML='<script>alert("DOM")</script>'`
- **Encoded**: `outerHTML%3D%27%3Cscript%3Ealert%28%22DOM%22%29%3C%2Fscript%3E%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~38000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:41:58.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
